sourcesContent:
<script>
import axios from 'axios';

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      rankList: [] // 存储评分排行榜数据
    };
  },
  mounted() {
    this.getRankList(); // 在组件挂载后获取评分排行榜数据
  },
  methods: {
    async getRankList() {
      // 调用 API 获取全部歌单
      const songListResponse = await axios.get(`/api/songList`);
      const songList = songListResponse.data;

      // 遍历歌单，获取评分并排序
      const rankList = [];
      for (const song of songList.data) { // 修改此处为 songList.data
        const rankResponse = await axios.get(`/api/rankList?songListId=${song.songListId}`);
        const rank = rankResponse.data;

        rankList.push({
          songListId: song.songListId,
          songListName: song.songListName,
          rank: rank
        });
      }

      // 根据评分排序
      rankList.sort((a, b) => b.rank - a.rank);

      // 更新组件的 rankList 数据
      this.rankList = rankList;
    }
  }
};
</script>
